Classes Files Methods Extras

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • Ctrl-T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    In frame mode you can toggle the list naviation frame on the left side:

    • Ctrl-L Toggle list view

    You can focus a list in frame mode or toggle a tab in frameless mode:

    • Ctrl-C Class list
    • Ctrl-I Mixin list
    • Ctrl-F File list
    • Ctrl-M Method list
    • Ctrl-E Extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • Ctrl-S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input

    In frameless mode you can close the list tab:

    • Esc Close list tab

    Class: Table

    Defined in: src/lock.iced

    Overview

    A table of named locks.

    Instance Method Summary

    • - (void) constructor() Constructor
    • - (void) acquire(name, cb, wait) Callback with (l,was_open) where l is the NamedLock and was_open is a bool saying whether it was open to begin with.
    • - (void) lookup(name)

    Constructor Details

    - (void) constructor()

    Instance Method Details

    - (void) acquire(name, cb, wait)

    Callback with (l,was_open) where l is the NamedLock and was_open is a bool saying whether it was open to begin with.

    Parameters:

    • name (String) — The name of the lock to grab or create.
    • cb (callback) — The callback to fire when acquired;

    - (void) lookup(name)

    Parameters:

    • name (String) — The name of the lock to grab.
